text: Geraldine James (born 6 July 1950) is an English actress. She has acted in television series, such as She's Been Away. She played Portia in a Broadway production of The Merchant of Venice in 1989. More recently, she acted in the movie Diana in 2013. James was born in Berkshire, England. ==References== Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:1950 births Category:Living people
title: Geraldine James
